main.name: Vikram Goyal, PhD
main.description: Here will be your description. Use this to describe what you do or whatever you feel best describes yourself to a potential employer
main.bio: I am a faculty in IIIT-Delhi. I received my Ph.D. in Computer Science and Engineering from the Department of Computer Science and Engineering at IIT Delhi in 2009. Before pursuing Ph.D., I completed my M.Tech. in Information Systems from the Department of Computer Science and Engineering at NSIT Delhi in 2003. I have many publications in reputed conferences and referred journals. I have a couple of Projects from DST, India and Deity, India on problems related to Privacy in Location-based Services and Digitized Document Fraud Detection, respectively.
